entry.title: Satin Black Glass Component Stand
entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type:
Price: 329.00

Description

  • Satin black aluminum tube uprights
  • Open shelves for great airflow
  • 6mm tempered black safety glass
  • Generous high interior shelf space
  • Extra high bottom shelf space for taller components
  • Convenient cable management backing

Enjoy the easy to assemble design of the Laguna Collection. Open shelves provide a generous platform to house all of your A/V components while maintaining optimal airflow. Black tempered safety glass shelves and Satin Black uprights present an ultra modern style perfect for any space. Bring home this easy to assemble design by CorLiving, furnishing your home doesn’t get any easier than this.

Specifications

Assembly Required Yes
Product Dimensions 35"H X 26"W X 20"D
Product Weight 53 lbs.
Carton Shipping Dimensions 6"H X 29"W X 23"D
Carton Shipping Weight 57 lbs.
Materials Aluminum, Tempered Glass
Max Weight 185 lbs.

entry.title: Sound Bar Mounting Brackets
entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type:
Price: 44.00

Description

  • Mounts to the back of your television
  • Sleek Black metal finish
  • Adjustable design can be mounted to the top or bottom of your TV
  • Pair of brackets can hold up to 33lbs / 15kg

Maximize your home theater display with the new Sound Bar mounting brackets by Sonax. Conveniently hang your sound bar above or below your wall mounted TV for clear unobstructed sound with a sleek contemporary look. These discrete metal arms hang your sound bar perfectly top or bottom mounted from the back of your TV leaving surfaces clear and are the “must have" compliment to any wall mounted TV.

Specifications

Assembly Required Yes
Product Dimensions 18"H X 6"W X 0"D
Product Weight 2 lbs.
Carton Shipping Dimensions 1"H X 19"W X 7"D
Carton Shipping Weight 2 lbs.
Materials Metal
Max Weight 33 lbs.

entry.title: 29" Gloss Black Fixed Height Speaker Stand, Set of 2
entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type:
Price: 194.00

Description

  • Gloss black bookshelf speaker stand with tempered safety glass base and speaker shelf
  • Speaker shelf complete with anti-slip grip pads for stability
  • Solid aluminum and wood supporting pillar gives a classic look and is sturdy and durable
  • Cable management openings keep your cords organized and out of sight
  • Each stand comes with fastening belts to secure speaker to stand
  • Carpet spikes offer stability and equal distribution and isolation of vibrational energy allowing for optimal sound
  • Anti-scratch rubber feet included for floor protection
  • Sold as set of 2
  • Safely and securely holds speaker weighing up to 22lbs/10kg

Elevate your audio performance with this pair of bookshelf speaker stands. Designed to enhance your entertainment space, this universal design keeps speakers stable and secure, conceals cords and wires and optimizes audio from your speaker by minimizing floor distortion. Complete the look in your entertainment room with the addition of these 2 gloss black speaker stands.

Specifications

Assembly Required Yes
Product Dimensions 29"H X 10"W X 10"D
Product Weight 6 lbs.
Carton Shipping Dimensions 4"H X 29"W X 13"D
Carton Shipping Weight 14 lbs.
Materials Engineered Wood, Glass, Metal
Max Weight 0 lbs.

entry.title: Sound Bar Wall Shelf
entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type:
Price: 69.00

Description

  • 6mm thick, black tempered glass shelf
  • Fast and simple wall mounting
  • Extra wide to accommodate sound bar
  • Single shelf holds up to 5kgs / 11lbs

Add stylish support and ideal sound transfer for your Sound Bar with this wall mounted shelf. One narrow extra wide shelf can present your Sound Bar beneath your wall mounted TV for the ultimate in sound and look. Easy to mount, this shelf can hold up to 11lbs. Display your high value component safely up and out of the way and free up space in your home.
